description: This follows the standard "You're not allowed to customise, just shut up and use it how we decide you should" diktat of the entire KDE team these days.  I want to use this vertically, but it keeps resizing itself on each login - why? Why can't we just set a fixed size? Why can't we hide that "Show hidden icons" arrow thing? It's the same with ALL Plasmoids - you cannot place them exactly where you want them on screen, the computer forcibly moves it.  The dark-ages of computing are upon us.
I think it is very covienient and stylish. I also think it should have a reset settings.
